verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G1166>showed<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> a <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G4215>river<s%> of <S%G5204>water<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G2986>clear<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2930>crystal,<s%> <S%G1607>proceeding<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2362>throne<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G721>Lamb.<s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4113>street<s%> of <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> on either <S%G1782>side<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1782><s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4215>river,<s%> was there the <S%G3586>tree<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> which <S%G4160>bare<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> manner of <S%G2590>fruits,<s%> and <S%G591>yielded<s%> <S%G848>her<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G1538><s%> <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3376>month:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5444>leaves<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3586>tree<s%> were <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G2322>healing<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>nations.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> there shall <S%G2071>be<s%> no <S%G3756>more<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G2089><s%> <S%G2652>curse:<s%> <S%G2532>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2362>throne<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G721>Lamb<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>it;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> shall <S%G3000>serve<s%> him: <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> they shall <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4383>face;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> shall be <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G3359>foreheads.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> there shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G1563>there;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2192>need<s%> <S%G5532><s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3088>candle,<s%> <S%G2532>neither<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%> of the <S%G2246>sun;<s%> for the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> giveth them <S%G5461>light:<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they shall <S%G936>reign<s%> forever and <S%G1519>ever.<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G165><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G3056>sayings<s%> are <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G228>true:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> to <S%G1166>show<s%> unto <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1722>shortly<s%> <S%G5034><s%> be <S%G1096>done.<s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> quickly: <S%G5035><s%> <S%G3107>blessed<s%> is he that <S%G5083>keepeth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4394>prophecy<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G975>book.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G991>saw<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> them. <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> I had <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G991>seen,<s%> I fell <S%G4098>down<s%> to <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> which <S%G1166>showed<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> these <S%G5023>things.<s%>

Then <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> he unto <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G3708>See<s%> thou do it <S%G3361>not:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> fellow <S%G4889>servant,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of them which <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>sayings<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G975>book:<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G4972>Seal<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>sayings<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4394>prophecy<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G975>book:<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> at <S%G1451>hand.<s%>

He that is <S%G91>unjust,<s%> let him be <S%G91>unjust<s%> <S%G2089>still:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he which is <S%G4510>filthy,<s%> let him be <S%G4510>filthy<s%> <S%G2089>still:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he that is <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> let him be <S%G1344>righteous<s%> <S%G2089>still:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he that is <S%G40>holy,<s%> let him be <S%G37>holy<s%> <S%G2089>still.<s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5035>quickly;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3408>reward<s%> is <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me,<s%> to <S%G591>give<s%> every <S%G1538>man<s%> according <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> shall be. <S%G2071><s%>

I <S%G1473><s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G1>Alpha<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5598>Omega,<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5056>end,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> last. <S%G2078><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are they that <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G1785>commandments,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> may <S%G2071>have<s%> <S%G1849>right<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3586>tree<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> may enter <S%G1525>in<s%> through <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4440>gates<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4172>city.<s%>
